metadata.synopsis: After the act 2 epilogue, the party comments on resolving unfinished business before moving on to Baldur's Gate/act 3.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use "oe SCE_SetupDebrief" or use the debugbook to go to act 2 region "Epilogue".- Enter the trigger S_SCE_PartyVB_UnfinishedBusiness_Trigger_632ad7dc-a132-48c8-9357-6f27adb11e5e on the way to the road to Baldur's Gate near the TWN brewery

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The road to Baldur's Gate is up ahead. No turning back, once we start down that road.
